table_name.create: id bigint, order_code String, parent_order_code String, type int, name String, path String, img_path String, sign_id String, chk_code String, is_available int, is_deleted int, version_no int, create_userid bigint, create_username String, create_userip String, create_usermac String, create_time String, create_time_db String, server_ip String, update_userid bigint, update_username String, update_userip String, update_usermac String, update_time String, update_time_db String, client_versionno String, company_id bigint
table_name.select: ( select id, order_code, parent_order_code, type, name , path, img_path , sign_id , chk_code , is_available, is_deleted, version_no, create_userid, create_username , create_userip, create_usermac , create_time , create_time_db , server_ip, update_userid, update_username, update_userip, update_usermac, update_time, update_time_db, client_versionno, company_id from so_attachment ) spark_sql_so_attachment
